comment: Iyaa, Dea sekeluarga juga stay safe
amr:
# ::snt Iyaa, Dea sekeluarga juga stay safe
(s / stay-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Iyaa"))
            :op2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Dea"
                        :op2 "Skeluarga"
                        :op3 "Juga")))
      :ARG3 (s2 / safe-01
            :ARG1 a))

comment: semangat ka giaa semoga disegerakan, stay safe!
amr:
# ::snt semangat ka giaa semoga disegerakan, stay safe!
(s / stay-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG1 (y / you)
      :ARG3 (s2 / safe-01
            :ARG1 y)
      :mod (s3 / semangat
            :mod (d / disegerakan)))

comment: Wii selamat, lagi nunggu jadwal vaksin hheuuu sabarr
amr:
# ::snt Wii selamat, lagi nunggu jadwal vaksin hheuuu sabarr
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :mode expressive
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Wii"
                  :op2 "Slamat"))
      :snt2 (p2 / person
            :mode expressive
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Lagi")
            :mod (n3 / nunggu)
            :mod (v / vaksin)))
